headline: S&P 500 Gains & Losses Today: Johnson & Johnson Stock Jumps; Universal Health Services Shares Slide
summary: The S&P 500 ticked 0.3% higher on Wednesday, July 16, 2025, as President Trump sought to ease concerns that a dismissal of Fed Chair Jerome Powell could be imminent.

headline: UNIVERSAL HEALTH SERVICES, INC. ANNOUNCES DIVIDEND
summary: KING OF PRUSSIA, Pa., July 16, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Universal Health Services, Inc. announced today that its Board of Directors voted to pay a cash dividend of $0.20 per share on September 16, 2025...

headline: Why Universal Health Services (UHS) Shares Are Falling Today
summary: Shares of hospital management company Universal Health Services (NYSE:UHS) fell 3.6% in the morning session after a BofA Securities analyst downgraded the stock and lowered its price target.

headline: Wall Street Analysts Believe Universal Health Services (UHS) Could Rally 28.04%: Here's is How to Trade
summary: The average of price targets set by Wall Street analysts indicates a potential upside of 28% in Universal Health Services (UHS). While the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric is questionable, the positive trend in earnings estimate revisions might translate into an upside in the stock.
